title.rendered: His Excellency Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) received in audience His Excellency Sune Krogstrup

content.rendered:
The Honourable Minister of Foreign Affairs, His Excellency Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) received in audience His Excellency Sune Krogstrup, Ambassador of Denmark to Nigeria today, 13th March, 2024.
Discussions centred on ongoing partnership as well as proposed collaboration between Nigeria and Denmark in various sectors, including agriculture, green transition, trade & investment, diary industry, security, renewable energy, digital technology, maritime industry, health and education. Emphasis was also placed on enhancing people to people’s contact.
